name: Berocca Performance
description: Berocca Performance is a specifically tailored vitamin and mineral supplement that may help enhance mental and physical performance when taken daily. Effervescent tablets are quickly absorbed, easy to take and help meet your daily water intake needs. The effervescent tablet is available in great orange flavour. A daily Berocca Performance is the healthy way enabling you to be one step ahead. Berocca Performance is a unique combination of B vitamins, vitamin C and essential minerals, like calcium, magnesium and zinc, which works in synergy to improve your mental alertness and physical energy throughout the day. Take 1 tablet dissolved in a glass of water everyday to make a refreshing and delicious flavoured effervescent drink.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
